prodNameC: 諾法鐵水痘帶狀皰疹病毒免疫球蛋白A酵素免疫分析套組
ingredientsDesc:
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS Coated Wells (IgA): 12 breakapart 8-well snap-off strips coated with VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS recombinant antigen; vacuum sealed, in resealable aluminium foil.
IgA Sample Diluent ***: 1 bottle containing 100 ml of buffer for sample dilution; containing antihuman-IgA; pH 7.2 ± 0.2; coloured green; ready to use; white cap.
Stop Solution: 1 bottle containing 15 ml sulphuric acid, 0.2 mol/l; ready to use; red cap.
Washing Solution (20x conc.)*: 1 bottle containing 50 ml of a 20-fold concentrated buffer (pH 7.2 ± 0.2) for washing the wells; white cap.
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS anti-IgA Conjugate**: 1 bottle containing 20 ml of peroxidase labelled rabbit antibody to human IgA; coloured red, ready to use; black cap.
TMB Substrate Solution: 1 bottle containing 15 ml 3,3,5,5-tetramethylbenzidine (TMB); ready to use; yellow cap.
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS IgA Positive Control***: 1 bottle containing 2 ml; coloured yellow; ready to use; red cap.
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS IgA Cut-off Control***: 1 bottl
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 為人類血清中抗人類水痘帶狀皰疹病毒之免疫球蛋白A分類抗體之定性檢測。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3900 水痘帶狀皰疹病毒血清試劑
